SUB_W17_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Something about this world feels strange—
almost like there's a bunch of different
powers mixing. I bet it's got something
to do with my missing cats.

SUB_W17_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Wowzers, what a castle! Guess I should
start by talking to someone there, huh?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be welcome in Brighthome, my new warrior!
I am Din, the king of this land, and full glad
am I that you have answered my call.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Just so. I have summoned you hence so you
might join the battle against the forces
of Chaos spreading o'er this land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We are set against them in battle without end,
and require aid from warriors across the
Conjoined Worlds that we might continue
our brave endeavor.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
That doesn't make it sound like
your war is going especially well.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Our brave allies continue their valorous fight
across the land—and while we have seen many
victories, so too have we known much of defeat.
Alas, Chaos is not a foe easily laid low.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I would have you join us as we attempt to
drive our foes back unto the Cleft of Chaos,
located to the far north of this castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, now that you've got Ameya the Witch
on your side, victory is guaranteed!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
It seems you truly comprehend
your own worth as a warrior.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
The nearby village and fields were set upon
by the forces of Chaos, and the battle to
see them safe is now underway. And while I know it unseemly to ask this so
soon after your arrival in our world, I would
have you lend us your aid, that we might
drive our hated foe into obscurity.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
For sure I'll help! Oh, but first,
I wanted to ask if you've seen any
cats running around in your world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Brighthome is awash in cats, stranger—
but because they fear the power of Chaos,
beholding them will prove most difficult. Yet if we can weaken Chaos's hold
on the realm, you should be able
to find the felines you seek.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Heh. I pretty much knew what you were gonna say
before you opened your mouth. And on that note,
I'll help you fight Chaos so long as it helps me track
down the cat I need.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Then I hereby decree you to be our
newest warrior, and grant you the
proud appellation of Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Er, I'd prefer you call me Ameya, actually.
I'm just here to fight and find my kitty,
not create some 'brand-new-me' kind of sitch.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
All who find their way to Brighthome
are granted a name by the king, Seer.
Such is the way of things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text: Not a huge fan of that, but whatevs!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, you must be King Din's newest warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the warrior band
in this village and the surrounding area.
It's good to meet you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Likewise, Chief! Guess the enemy's pushed
pretty far into your territory if they can strike
this close to the castle, huh?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
This war is unfolding across all Brighthome—
and when things are going poorly for us on the
other side of the bridges, the forces of Chaos are
able to harry us as they like on this side.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
That said, they're nowhere near as strong here
as they are at the positions closest to the
Cleft of Chaos, which is why a man like me
can still be of some use. My field is governance, you see.
Not war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
So you're another one of the
people King Din called here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Indeed. From what I understand, the people
of this world can't hold their own in the war
against the forces of Chaos, so they call on
the power of fighters from other worlds.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Like I said, it's raging across Brighthome,
which makes it difficult to get an accurate
picture of the entire situation. That's likely
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
I mean, I'm glad he believes in me
and all, but I, like, JUST got here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
You have the power to see unobstructed.
To see much. To forecast. To watch. 
That's why you were given your name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text: So the name actually means something?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
While you'll often find yourself facing
many choices, you can only ever aid one
particular area at a time. And while the war will get worse in locations
where you don't help, you can't do anything
about that. You're just one woman, after all,
so try to keep that in mind.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
So the war will shift depending on my
decisions? Huh. In that case, I guess
I should start by checking out how
things are looking in the fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
You must be Seer, our new warrior.
I'm President, and I lead the fighters in this village
and the surrounding area. Thanks for the help.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Was it bad that I went
to the fields first?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text: Honestly, I was a little disappointed when you went there—but it wasn't wrong, per se. When it comes to where you go, all you can do is make whatever choice you think is best.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
But as you get deeper into the war and head over
the bridges, you need to have a plan in place—
because any locations on this side that you leave
on their own will be targeted by the enemy. And look, I know our ultimate goal is to
strike at the Cleft of Chaos, but if all
we think about is advancing the line...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Then everything on this side of the
bridges could end up in big trouble.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Yep. Slow and steady progress is the best
course—or at least that's what I think.
Everyone else seems to just want big
flashy results, though, so who knows.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Now, c'mon. Let's work together
and liberate Brighthome from the
clutches of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields. Nice to meet you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
The war's unfolding all across Brighthome, and
when things are going bad on the other side of
the bridges, the forces of Chaos show up here.
Hell, sometimes they even come to these fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
That said, the enemy's pretty weak here
compared to their strength near the
Cleft of Chaos, which is how a fellow
like me can still be useful. So if you need someone to watch over
a field, I'm your guy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you're another one of the
people King Din called here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure am! No idea why the king needed a wooden
thing like me to help out, but here I am—and
I want to do the best job I can to aid the people
and fields of this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lady, I'm basically a glorified scarecrow—
things like strategy and warfare and all that
are beyond my pay grade. I'm guessing that's
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I'm glad he's got such a high
opinion of me, but I don't really
know what I'm doing.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, but he named you the Seer, right?
That means you've got the power to see
things unobstructed—to predict the future,
watch what unfolds, and understand it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
But no matter how much you can see, you can still
only help one place at a time—so the others will
just have to figure out some other way to get by. I know that sounds rough, but trust me,
you'll get used to it. Just remember that
you're not fighting alone, so get out
there and do the best you can, okay?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
So the war will shift depending on my
decisions? Huh. In that case, I guess
I should start by checking out how
things are looking in the village.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warrior!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text: Sorry I didn't get here sooner.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, it wasn't great watching you head
to the village before us, but I figured
you'd make it out this way eventually.
And now look! Here you are.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Just remember that the closer you get to
the Cleft of Chaos in the hinterlands,
the harder it will be for you to come
back here and help out. Basically, while you're off helping at one
location, positions elsewhere might fall to
the forces of Chaos. It's a huge bummer,
but them's the breaks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Meaning I really have to consider
the big picture when I'm choosing
my next course of action.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yep. As for me, my job is to keep
an eye on things—and thankfully,
I am GREAT at standing completely
motionless and staring at stuff!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now get out there and let's give this
fight all we've got—for Brighthome's
people AND its fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the newcomer, eh, Seer? Tongues around
here are all a'wag about how you're the greatest
thing since milled bread, which is why the king
is expecting all these great things from you. Me though? I don't trust that kind of talk—
and folks like you who encourage it really
chap my cheeks. So I think it's time to knock
you around and show you what's what.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: What!? You gotta be kidding me!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. You ain't half bad, Seer.
The name's Bully—or at least that's
what people around here call me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, that's what I thought:
all talk, no fists. Well, I'm Bully—leader of the warrior band
in these parts. Pretty short name, but you
seem a bit dense, so write it down somewhere
if it helps you remember.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: What sort of place is this?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I only just got here myself, so I don't
know a whole lot more than you.
Basically, stuff that's dug up here gets
sent to King Din's castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Ah, I see. It's the king's mine, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's use it to help nearby areas.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's send more stuff to the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. I like the way you think, Seer—
sending all this junk off to the king
always struck me as a hell of a waste.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Okay, but we're good just doing that?
I mean, won't the king get mad?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
We couldn't fight the forces of Chaos if we
were afraid of what the damn king might do!
Look, I'll just sock him one if he complains,
so don't worry that pretty face about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So the king's boots ain't been tonguewashed
enough for your liking, eh? Sure thing, Seer.
I hear ya loud and clear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You must be the new war asset I keep hearing
about. I take it you're traveling the world
like some commando unit? Ah, but that
makes me jealous... Anyway, I'm Warden, and it's my job
to watch over the graveyard.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, hang on. A bunch of warriors
are watching over a graveyard?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
When the dead are pulling themselves out of the
dirt and roaming the land? You better believe it.
Hell, that's the dictionary definition of Chaos,
ain't it, pal? That's why the enemy's always got
their beady little eyes fixed on
the corpses here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
On top of that, we've got bodies piling up like
cordwood, and not enough hands to see 'em
properly buried. We're pretty much cleaning
up after the other warrior bands' messes.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Also, King Din might've named me Warden,
but I don't see why I've gotta resign myself
to watching over some moldering old graves. I should be out there saving grand castles,
sacred temples, and ancient ruins. I mean,
hell, any idiot can keep an eye on a grave,
but I was meant for greater things!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Sure, but complaining about it won't
do any good. Can I help you out?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Eh, you're good people for offering,
but it's my job, and I'll see it through.
You keep yourself alive out there, y'hear?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there! I KNOW you're not here
to steal my prey, right? Riiight!? Hmm... Now that I look more closely,
I don't think I've seen your face before.
Which warrior band are you with?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: I'm Ameya! Uh, I mean, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, right. The new 'reinforcements.'
I heard a warrior with the power to
turn the tide of the war was coming—
though can't say I'm seeing it in you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, YOU can't be much of a warrior if
you're judging people on appearances!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hmph. Well, so long as I get to keep fighting my
heart out, I don't care what you do or how the
war effort's going overall. I chew up fiends and
spit 'em out, and that's what makes sense to me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Seems like there's a lot of warriors with
a lot of different attitudes around here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm just a fighter invited here by King Din.
If you wanna know all the whys and hows,
you'll have to ask the big man himself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Now, are you gonna stand here griping
at me all day, or are you gonna get out
there and scope some more positions?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: Fair point. I'll go do that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Seems the fight with Chaos has left
this town battered and crumbling.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
But some people yet live here,
and we fight to protect them. I am Floral. You are Seer, the one
people are talking about, yes?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I guess so—although I hope
they're saying good things!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Good and bad in equal measure—the good
being that you might be the one who can
bring an end to this wretched war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And the bad? ...Actually, never mind.
It won't do me any good to know.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I put little stock in rumors in any event;
I seek only to ascertain the truth of you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, just watch what I do next
and you'll be able to figure it out.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
In that case, test your mettle against the
forces of Chaos here in town so I might
determine your truth. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gunner. You are Seer, yes?
We have succeeded in retaking
the stronghold, and I thank you
for your assistance.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
We're near the Cleft of Chaos, which is
why Chaos's forces are so much stronger.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed. This fortress was built to deal with
the mighty fiends that emerge from the Cleft,
but it had fallen into enemy hands long ago.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, it's high time we face off
against our enemies at the Cleft!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
No, the time is not yet right. We will better
our chances at successfully cutting off the
Cleft if we take all the positions around it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Good plan—and you can count
on me to see it done!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
This place looks like some kind of temple.
We're super close to the Cleft of Chaos,
but there aren't any fiends around.
And I'm also sensing...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I was surprised to see another newcomer here,
but then I realized you must be Seer.
And I was even MORE surprised to learn
that you are a witch like me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
How'd you like your front-row seat
to an Ameya Aisling butt-kicking!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
You clearly know how to fight, Seer. Perhaps
you truly are the one who will bring an end
to the war with Chaos—not that the prospect
thrills me, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome to Hell, Seer. Have you
found the cat you're looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Is this place a mess because of
the whole Chaos situation?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This place was a ruin well before the
Cleft of Chaos even opened. This is
why it attracts the forces of Chaos,
and why it has become Hell itself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And so I guess you're its watchman?
Gotta say, you seem really chill
given... Well, everything.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You would name me the watchman of Hell?
You're a funny thing.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You seem different from the other
warriors here. I take it King Din
called you to this place, too?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gadget. I came here with my own name,
but that's the one I use now that I'm working
for the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, and so long as I'm Seer and fighting
for a warrior band, I need to put victory
in the war foremost in my mind. I'm really glad I came here.
Thanks, Gadget!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ha! I never expected to meet someone expressing
thanks here in Hell! I certainly don't get such things
from those beasts that flood out of the Cleft of Chaos!
Kyaaa ha ha!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And with that, it appears we've enemies
closing in. I'll be certain to share a couple
of them with you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, I went to the temple and the ruins.
Those other warriors sure are unique!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Those warriors are interested in nothing save
demonstrating their own strength—they could
not care less about the war or cooperating
with our other positions across the land. That said, they are also the only reason
you and I are able to continue fighting
so close to the Cleft.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You could probably get them to cooperate
with you here at the stronghold now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I wager this is true—and hope so
as well. For now is our chance
to march on the Cleft of Chaos!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you have arrived at last.
Well done, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes, but we still haven't gained
control of the ruins, Your Majesty.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Be that as it may, we cannot let
slip this opportunity to strike
at the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, whatever comes at us,
we'll take it down!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes, but we still haven't gained
control of the ruins, Your Majesty.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.text: Your Majesty? Why are you here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I would bear witness to the
final battle for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.text:
In that case, I'll make it a
final battle for the ages!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.text:
This legendary treasure is way
more useful than I thought!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Do not let up! Strike at them
and seal the Cleft!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
And with that, the Cleft is sealed.
For a time, at least, peace will
reign across the land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Wait, so it's gonna open again?
Can't you seal it off for good?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We have attempted many approaches—such
as blockading it with soil or water—but ever
does the maw of Chaos yawn wide. All we can do is enjoy a moment's peace
until the time comes when we must
summon warriors once more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.text:
The Cleft's appearance leads to the arrival of
warriors, and we are able to meet their kind
from across the worlds only when it is open.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Yeah, I suppose that's true. I mean,
without this fight, we wouldn't have met.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Indeed—and my having met with you is
one of the supreme delights of my life!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.text: 'For a time'? So this isn't the end?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.text:
The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew.
Warriors will then arrive in Brighthome once
more, for such is the way of things here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.text:
So this world is just trapped
in a forever war?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.text:
Correct, Seer. Brighthome is a world locked
in eternal conflict—but this only makes our
fleeting moments of peace all the sweeter.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.text:
I thank you one and all,
my brave warrior bands!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.text:
And thus is the Cleft blocked off.
Your strength was formidable, Seer—
rather too formidable, in fact.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.text:
I so enjoy watching our warriors do battle that
I often find myself wishing the war might go on
forever. Thus did I call you here to shore up
the fighting strength of our bands, but now...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.text:
The war going on and on might suit YOU better,
but we were out there fighting to win,
so don't give me a hard time about it!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.text:
I have no further use for you, Seer.
Begone from my sight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.text:
Believe me, I'll be outta here
the second I find my cat.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.text:
So you can't close up the Cleft for good
even with a legendary weapon's strength?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.text:
Correct. The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew. New warriors
will then arrive in Brighthome, making this but a single
page in our great history.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.text:
Does that mean the legendary relic
is also going to vanish again?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.text: A legend must ever remain a legend.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.text:
Hm... I think 'His Majesty'
is hiding something.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This place looks like some kind of temple.
We're super close to the Cleft of Chaos,
but there aren't any fiends around.
And I'm also sensing...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I was surprised to see another newcomer here,
but then I realized you must be Seer.
And I was even MORE surprised to learn
that you are a witch like me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapon is made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
How'd you like your front-row seat
to an Ameya Aisling butt-kicking!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Perhaps you truly are the one who will bring
an end to the battle with Chaos. I pray this
might be so, for I have grown weary of war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Why would you come to Hell itself?
Is it really so important that you find a cat?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You sure know how to make a lady feel
welcome. You in a bad mood or something?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I've no time for idle chatter,
woman. Begone!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Wait! Did King Din
call you here, too?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I am Gadget. I came here with my own name,
but that's the one I use now that I work for King Din.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Same deal for me. But hey, since we're both
warriors here, why don't we work together
and help each other out?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
As though 'help' could even exist in Hell.
If you cling to the thread of salvation,
sooner or later it will snap and send you
plummeting into the abyss.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
And with that, the enemies close in.
Let us see how you fare, Seer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you've come for a grave, you can dig your own.
I don't have enough hands to be digging one for
everybody who keels over right now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ignoring that very upsetting statement,
why do fiends care about a graveyard?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
The bastards come here, dig up corpses,
and turn 'em into servants of Chaos. And if they manage to take the place,
we'll be up to our armpits in enemies
trying to send us into our own graves.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like a pretty important position
in the war; you must be super strong
if you're the one in charge of it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hell yeah I'm strong—ask any of the other
warriors around here, and they'll all tell ya
no one holds a candle to the Warden!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't leave! I've more to say!
...Bah, she's gone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Man, Chaos is nothing to sneeze at if
they're able to build a fortress like this.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
They did not build this stronghold—
they stole it from us. This is why
it's proven so difficult to reclaim.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well then, let's do something about that!
This position is bound to be important 
to the war against Chaos, right?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That is correct. Also, I am Gunner,
the leader of the warrior band here.
Thank you for your aid, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems the fight with Chaos has left
this town battered and crumbling.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It did—and soon, every place in this
world will suffer the same fate.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_020.text:
But that's what we were called here for,
right? To stop that from happening?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.text:
If the warrior bands were truly so powerful,
this war would not have dragged on so long.
Alas, the reality of the war with Chaos is
not so kind as all that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Eh, I'll sort something out.
Just you watch!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.text: Indeed you will, for you are Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You talk like you have a window into
what's gonna happen in the future.
Who even ARE you?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I am Floral, and the land tells me all.
The forces of Chaos will be upon us soon.
I pray you might fight them off, Seer!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, joy. King Din's little plaything
is back. Not looking all that reliable
this time, are you, plaything?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The king called you here too, man.
You're the same as me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The same!? THE SAME!? I'll show you
how different we are, plaything!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Guess the only difference between us
is that I'm standing here and you're lying
on the ground with a kicked butt.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks a ton for your help out here
in the fields. I mean, not that we're
growing anything, but still.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.text:
'Cause I'm Manikin, a glorified scarecrow
who can't do anything BUT protect fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.text:
C'mon. If King Din called you here,
there has to be SOMETHING you can
do that no one else can. So what is it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
No idea. Glorified scarecrow, remember?
But there WAS something I realized this
one time when I was staring motionlessly
at the fields...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.text: There are no crows in Brighthome!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Crows? Like, 'caw caw' crows?
Well, neat, I guess.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, I'm so glad you're here, Seer!
I've been waiting for you to come
for SO LONG!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You gotta take me the hell out of here,
because I absolutely cannot STAND
being here one second longer! C'mon, you can do that, right? Please!
I'll do anything! I'm begging you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
But won't this place be overrun
by Chaos if you abandon it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I chew up fiends and spit 'em back out!
Then I do it again! And again! And AGAIN!
I can't take it anymore! I CAAAAAAN'T!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Sorry, but we're here because we were
called by King Din; we don't have any
choice but to defeat Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.text: No! Don't go! Don't leave me here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
If the forces of Chaos are showing up this
close to the castle, this war might finally
be close to ending...in our defeat. Oh. Hello there. I'm President.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Hey, if you lose heart like that,
you'll lose even the winnable battles. So I'm Ameya the Witch, but the
name King Din gave me is Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
So you're Seer. Well, considering you only
just arrived, I see why you would trust
in King Din's power. But for the rest of us, it doesn't mean
squat. That guy doesn't do a damn thing;
whatever we accomplish, we do on our own.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I know the warrior bands are doing their best,
but there's been no indication that the forces
of Chaos are weakening—so if you think I'm
losing heart, that's why.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Well, I can't give up on the war; I came here
to do something, and I can't do it until the
battle is ended. But I'm gonna figure it out,
so please just hold on a little longer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Well, you certainly seem confident,
so...I guess I'll trust you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Yeah, that's the spirit!
We'll get through this together!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Blargh! It's just as I feared! 
The rebels have appeared!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes. My name's Immunity, and it's my job to
keep the warriors King Din summoned from
betraying him and joining up with Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Wow, there really ARE all types among the
king's warriors! So I'm guessing that in the
end, you weren't able to stop them and
they all ended up rebelling?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
YES, ACTUALLY! THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT THEY DID!
I mean, King Din may have named me Immunity,
but I can't immunize people from wanting to
rebel! Heck, all I really do is carry oxygen...

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Then we've gotta stop 'em before they
attract more people to the cause!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Wow, there really ARE all types among the
king's warriors! So I'm guessing that in the
end, you weren't able to stop them and
they all ended up rebelling?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, you just leave this
little uprising to me!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Where in the hells be that legendary treasure,
by gar!? I searched this blasted castle from
stem to stern, and I ain't been findin' the
gods-damned thing anywhere!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So you're another one of the
people King Din called here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yar, lass! Announce yerself before ye appear
and start yer yammerin'! Ye made me jump
outta me skin, so ye did! Gar, but I be Pirate. Who be ye?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Gahar har har! King Din's
little trump card! Sorry to break it to ye, lass, but there
already be a treasure hidden here in Brighthome
that can turn the tide of the war without ye—
and I was called here to be sniffin' it out!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
All I'm sniffing here are lies and some
serious I've-been-locked-up-in-a-cramped-
boat-way-too-long body odor.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Yar, what kind of base cutpurse
do ye be takin' me for!? Oh, but it matters little—this
whole castle is bare as a pile
of bleached bones.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
A treasure that could turn the tide of
the war, eh? Not an easy thing to do,
even with magic. I wonder if it's real.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Gar, curse me bones!
It ain't here, neither!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't think a legendary treasure
would be in a village like this.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Manikin is going to be angry
if she digs up all his fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
They would've found it a long
time ago if it was in the mine.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text: She's not digging up graves, right?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Doesn't look like she's doing
any damage to the building.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
She's not stealing from
anyone in town, right?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
They'd have found and used
it by now if it was here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
You'd think it'd be in a place
like this, but I guess not.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text: Not in the ruins, either? Huh.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gahar har har! I've found it!
The legendary treasure!

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Wow, it's real! Now let's see you
use it and turn the tide of the war!

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gar, ye be followin' me,
ye detestable urchin! And aye, I'll turn the tide—but I'll
be keepin' the treasure afterwards!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You pitched in to fight too, Guv?
Much appreciated.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Heya, Guv! You helped with the
fighting? Thanks for that!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Been a minute and a half, eh, Guv?
You and I gotta scrap next time!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You were out there fighting, Guv?
My apologies—I did not realize.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Ha ha ha! Been a long time, Guv!
Let's spar again sometime.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Why, if it isn't Guv!
I thank you for joining the fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Your presence here explains
our victory, Guv. Thank you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, well. If it isn't Guv.
Surprised you're still out there
fighting and not retired already.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You're looking pretty tired there, Guv.
Ready for your trip to Hell so soon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Guv! You were saying all that stuff
about being worn out and battered,
but here you are fighting up a storm!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.text:
You're Seer, yes? Ah, it's no wonder I felt
that dazzling radiance; with a warrior like
you here, I can finally retire in peace.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the fields.
I pray your fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the mine.
I pray your fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the cemetery.
I pray your fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the church. I pray your
fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the stronghold. I pray
your fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the temple. I pray your
fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the ruins. I pray your
fight goes well, milady.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.text:
I don't see Guv or his lady around.
I wonder how they're doing?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.text:
I'm sure they're off living
a happy life somewhere.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.text: Ah! You must be the newcomer.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.text: That's right! Er, how'd you know?

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Age isn't a factor for warriors in Brighthome.
Young and old, known and unknown—warriors of
all stripes are called to this place. But no matter their actual age, every newcomer
has a certain youthful vitality to them—
a vitality I sense now in you.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, such vitality is something a wizened old man
like me has lost. I'm a warrior as well, you see—
though a worn and battered one. Guv is the name
given to me by the king, and all I'll answer to.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, why don't you take a little rest?
I'll take up the fight from here,
so you don't have to worry.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ha! You've quite the silver tongue,
newcomer! Just make certain you
fight as well as you flatter.

SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_FUNC_AMYA_HELP_000_CUT_000_060.text: Oh, you can count on it!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.text:
With the battle ended, we no longer need
to use the names given to us by the king.
I am called Simon.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.text: Did you find the cat you needed?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You bet I did. Speaking of, did you first
come to this world because you had
something you wanted to accomplish?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The members of my squadron all perished
in battle—and when I failed to fulfill
my objective, I joined them in death. The next thing I knew, I was waking
here in Brighthome with a new name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What!? Oh my gosh, am I actually DEAD?
Eeep! I'd better head back to the
Lost Realms and make sure!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Is my following you
out of the question?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm happy to have you, but, uh, you're dead.
Doesn't that mean you'd just disappear
forever the moment you left Brighthome?

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I have no intention of fighting for all
eternity in Brighthome. If I disappear,
that is simply as it was meant to be.

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Can't argue with that logic.
Well then, c'mon!

SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W17_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Ugh. Digging up the fields means
being COVERED in dirt.
